comment: Class for creating custom tests, e.g. for a specific LSX.
commenthtml: Class for creating custom tests, e.g. for a specific LSX.

methods.label: addTestSuite
methods.comment: Loads a BaliTestSuite into the tester, in which to record the results
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New BaliTestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Dim tester as New DateTimeTester()   &apos; Extends AbstractBaliCustomTester
Call tester.addTestSuite(testSuite).runTests()
methods.signature: Function addTestSuite(testSuite As BaliTestSuite) As AbstractBaliCustomTester
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testSuite as New BaliTestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Dim tester as New DateTimeTester()   &apos; Extends AbstractBaliCustomTester&lt;br /&gt;Call tester.addTestSuite(testSuite).runTests()
methods.commenthtml: Loads a BaliTestSuite into the tester, in which to record the results

arguments.label: testSuite
arguments.comment: BaliTestSuite in which to record results

methods.label: runTests
methods.comment: Main function to run tests. Must be overridden.
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New BaliTestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Dim tester as New DateTimeTester()   &apos; Extends AbstractBaliCustomTester
  
Call tester.addTestSuite(testSuite).runTests()
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testSuite as New BaliTestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)&lt;br /&gt;Dim tester as New DateTimeTester()   &apos; Extends AbstractBaliCustomTester&lt;br /&gt;  &lt;br /&gt;Call tester.addTestSuite(testSuite).runTests()
methods.commenthtml: Main function to run tests. Must be overridden.
